00047 #define ENABLE_ADDRESS_RESPONSE                   (1)
00048 #define ENABLE_HELLO_STR                          (1)
00049 #define ENABLE_TX_ADDRESS                         (1)
00050 
00051 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00053 #define GET_MS()  (u32)TIME_TICK2MS(Time_GetTick())
00054 #endif

00058 void UxART_RS485MainRoutine(void);
00059 void UxART_SendAddress(u8 uAddress);
00060 void UxARD_SendData(u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLength);

00067 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms);

00070 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00071 vu32 guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_IDLE;
00072 
00073 uc8  *gURTx_Ptr;
00074 vu32 gURTx_Length = 0;
00075 u8  *gURRx_Ptr;
00076 vu32 gURRx_Length = 0;
00077 
00078 vu32 gIsTxFinished = FALSE;
00079 
00080 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00081 uc8 gHelloString[] = "RS485 Slave is addressed! Please change to Parity Space and enter 5 characters...\r\n";
00082 u8 gTx_Buffer[128];
00083 u8 gRx_Buffer[128];

00085 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00086 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00087   * @brief  Main program.
00088   * @retval None
00089   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00090 int main(void)
00091 {
00092   #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00093   Time_Init();
00094   if (WaitLSEClockReady(2000) == ERROR)
00095   {
00096     #if 1
00097     // Wait for LSE clock Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00098     while(1);
00099     #endif
00100   }
00101 
00102   if (HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_LSE, 2000) == ERROR)
00103   {
00104     #if 1
00105     // Wait for HSI Auto Trim Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00106     while(1);
00107     #endif
00108   }
00109   #endif
00110 
00111   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00112   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00113 
00114   gURRx_Ptr = gRx_Buffer;
00115 
00116   UxART_Configuration();
00117 
00118   while (1)
00119   {
00120     UxART_RS485MainRoutine();
00121   }
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*************************************************************************************************************
00125   * @brief  Configure the UxART
00126   * @retval None
00127   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00128 void UxART_Configuration(void)
00129 {
00130   #if 0 // Use following function to configure the IP clock speed.
00131   // The UxART IP clock speed must be faster 16x then the baudrate.
00132   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(CKCU_PCLK_UxARTn, CKCU_APBCLKPRE_DIV2);
00133   #endif
00134 
00135   { /* Enable peripheral clock of AFIO, UxART                                                               */
00136     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00137     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                   = 1;
00138     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_CLK = 1;
00139     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_IPN         = 1;
00140     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00141   }
00142 
00143   /* Turn on UxART Rx internal pull up resistor to prevent unknow state                                     */
00144   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00145 
00146   /* Config AFIO mode as UxART function.                                                                    */
00147   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_TX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_TX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00148   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_RX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00149   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_RTS_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_RTS_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART); // RS485 TXE
00150 
00151   {
00152     /* UxART configured as follow:
00153           - BaudRate = 115200 baud
00154           - Word Length = 8 Bits
00155           - One Stop Bit
00156           - None parity bit
00157     */
00158 
00159     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00160        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00161        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00162     */
00163     USART_InitTypeDef USART_InitStructure = {0};
00164     USART_InitStructure.USART_BaudRate = 115200;
00165     USART_InitStructure.USART_WordLength = USART_WORDLENGTH_8B;
00166     USART_InitStructure.USART_StopBits = USART_STOPBITS_1;
00167     USART_InitStructure.USART_Parity = USART_PARITY_MARK;
00168     USART_InitStructure.USART_Mode = USART_MODE_RS485;
00169     USART_Init(HTCFG_UART_PORT, &USART_InitStructure);
00170   }
00171 
00172   /* RS485 NMM mode, TXE active high, with default Parity Mark                                              */
00173   USART_RS485NMMCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00174   USART_RS485TxEnablePolarityConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_RS485POLARITY_HIGH);
00175   USART_StickParityCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00176   USART_StickParityConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_STICK_HIGH); // Set Parity high as address packet
00177 
00178   /* Set 0 ~ 255 guard time between latest Tx bit and TXE(RTS) inactive                                     */
00179   USART_SetGuardTime(HTCFG_UART_PORT, 4);
00180 
00181   /* Enable UxART interrupt of NVIC                                                                         */
00182   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_UART_IRQn);
00183 
00184   /* Enable UxART Rx interrupt                                                                              */
00185   USART_IntConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_INT_RXDR | USART_INT_RSADD, ENABLE);
00186 
00187   /* Enable UxART Tx function                                                                               */
00188   USART_TxCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00189 }
00190 
00191 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00192   * @brief  UxART Tx Test.
00193   * @retval None
00194   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00195 void UxART_RS485MainRoutine(void)
00196 {
00197   switch (guSlaveState)
00198   {
00199     case RS485_STATE_ADDRESSED:
00200     {
00201       #if (ENABLE_ADDRESS_RESPONSE == 1)
00202       UxART_SendAddress(HTCFG_RS485_MASTER_ADDR);
00203       #endif
00204       guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_ADDR_RESPONSE;
00205       break;
00206     }
00207     case RS485_STATE_ADDR_RESPONSE:
00208     {
00209       if (gIsTxFinished == TRUE)
00210       {
00211         #if (ENABLE_HELLO_STR == 1)
00212         UxARD_SendData((u8 *)gHelloString, sizeof(gHelloString) - 1);
00213         #endif
00214         guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_RX;
00215       }
00216       break;
00217     }
00218     case RS485_STATE_RX:
00219     {
00220       if (UxART_RxTest() != 0)
00221       {
00222         #if (ENABLE_TX_ADDRESS)
00223         UxART_SendAddress(HTCFG_RS485_MASTER_ADDR);
00224         #endif
00225         guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_TX_ADDR;
00226       }
00227       break;
00228     }
00229     case RS485_STATE_TX_ADDR:
00230     {
00231       if (gIsTxFinished == TRUE)
00232       {
00233         UxART_TxTest();
00234         guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_TX;
00235       }
00236     }
00237     case RS485_STATE_TX:
00238     {
00239       if (gIsTxFinished == TRUE)
00240       {
00241         gURRx_Length = 0;
00242         guSlaveState = RS485_STATE_RX;
00243       }
00244     }
00245     default:
00246     {
00247       break;
00248     }
00249   }
00250 }
00251 
00252 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00253   * @brief  Send address packet.
00254   * @retval None
00255   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00256 void UxART_SendAddress(u8 uAddress)
00257 {
00258   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00259      A delay may need here for RS485 TX/RX direction changing.
00260   */
00261   //...
00262 
00263   USART_StickParityConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_STICK_HIGH); // Set Parity high as address packet
00264 
00265   gTx_Buffer[0] = HTCFG_RS485_MASTER_ADDR;
00266 
00267   gIsTxFinished = FALSE;
00268   gURTx_Ptr = gTx_Buffer;
00269   gURTx_Length = 1;
00270   USART_IntConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_INT_TXDE | USART_INT_TXC, ENABLE);
00271 
00272   #if 0 // Set 1 for blocking-mode
00273   while (gURTx_Length != 0);      // Latest byte move to UxART shift register, but the transmission may be on going.
00274   while (gIsTxFinished == FALSE); // Set by TXC interrupt, transmission is finished.
00275   #endif
00276 }
00277 
00278 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00279   * @brief  Send UART data by interrupt mode.
00280   * @param  pBuffer: buffer for sned
00281   * @param  uLength: data length
00282   * @retval None
00283   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00284 void UxARD_SendData(u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLength)
00285 {
00286   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00287      A delay may need here for RS485 TX/RX direction changing.
00288   */
00289   //...
00290 
00291   USART_StickParityConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_STICK_LOW); // Set Parity low as data packet
00292 
00293   gIsTxFinished = FALSE;
00294   gURTx_Ptr = (u8 *)pBuffer;
00295   gURTx_Length = uLength;
00296   USART_IntConfig(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_INT_TXDE | USART_INT_TXC, ENABLE);
00297 
00298   #if 0 // Set 1 for blocking-mode
00299   while (gURTx_Length != 0);      // Latest byte move to UxART shift register, but the transmission may be on going.
00300   while (gIsTxFinished == FALSE); // Set by TXC interrupt, transmission is finished.
00301   #endif
00302 }
00303 
00304 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00305   * @brief  UxART Rx Test.
00306   * @retval None
00307   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00308 u32 UxART_RxTest(void)
00309 {
00310   u32 uResult = 0;
00311 
00312   /* Waiting for receive 5 data                                                                             */
00313   if (gURRx_Length >= 5)
00314   {
00315     // Process Rx data by gRx_Buffer[] and gURRx_Length here
00316     // .....
00317 
00318     uResult = 1;
00319   }
00320 
00321   return uResult;
00322 }
00323 
00324 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00325   * @brief  UxART Tx Test..
00326   * @retval None
00327   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00328 void UxART_TxTest(void)
00329 {
00330   #if 1 // Loop back Rx data to Tx for test
00331   u32 i;
00332   for (i = 0; i < 5; i++)
00333   {
00334     gTx_Buffer[i] = gRx_Buffer[i];
00335   }
00336 
00337   UxARD_SendData(gTx_Buffer, 5);
00338   #endif
00339 }
00340 
00341 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00342 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00343   * @brief  Wait LSE Clock Ready
00344   * @retval None
00345   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00346 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms)
00347 {
00348   u32 start=GET_MS();
00349 
00350   while (CKCU_GetClockReadyStatus(CKCU_FLAG_LSERDY) == RESET)
00351   {
00352     if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00353     {
00354       return ERROR;
00355     }
00356   }
00357 
00358   return SUCCESS;
00359 }
00360 
00361 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00362   * @brief  Auto Trim by LSE configuration.
00363   * @retval None
00364   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00365 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms)
00366 {
00367   u32 start;
00368   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimClkConfig(CLKSRC);
00369   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimCmd(ENABLE);
00370 
00371   start=GET_MS();
00372   if (uTimeout_ms != 0)
00373   {
00374     while (CKCU_HSIAutoTrimIsReady() == FALSE)
00375     {
00376       if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00377       {
00378          return ERROR;
00379       }
00380     }
00381   }
00382 
00383   return SUCCESS;
00384 }
00385 #endif

00394 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00395 {
00396   /*
00397      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00398      Debug message can be added here.
00399      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00400   */
00401 
00402   while (1)
00403   {
00404   }
00405 }
00406 #endif
